title: 2019 Masters (snooker)
summary: The 2019 Masters (also referred to as the 2019 Dafabet Masters for the purposes of sponsorship) was a professional non-ranking snooker tournament, that took place between 13 and 20 January 2019 in London, England and the second of three Triple Crown events in the 2018â€“19 snooker season. It was the 45th staging of the Masters, and was broadcast in Europe by the BBC and Eurosport.[1]
